text: Our agents have recovered the corpse of the Hand of Nagash from Kislev, very little remains after he was slain by the magical sword Grudgebringer. If we were to retake Morgheim and recover certain artifacts we may be able to resurrect the Hand.

Our agents have recovered the corpse of the Hand of Nagash from Kislev, very little remains after he was slain by the magical sword Grudgebringer. If we were to retake Morgheim and recover certain artifacts we may be able to resurrect the Hand.
Hand of Nagash available in the lord recruitment pool
We may have failed once but we will not fail again in bringing our fellow disciple back from the grave.
